title: Elk Creek Cafe and Aleworks
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegan options include one entree special of the day, multiple appetizers (kalamatta + herb oil bruschetta, Belgian hand cut fries, hummus platter), multiple salads (roasted beet + fennel, house green) and brunch options like tofu scramble. This bistro and brew pub sources ingredients as often as possible from local and sustainable farms. They bake desserts in-house. Coffee is organic and fair trade. Zero-waste operation. Free Wi-fi. Local bands perform some evenings.
